messages.message: hi eng friends! I'm doing a bit of session spelunking for cap1 would love a bit of pointing in the right direction.
1. We store user sessions in user_session in the db. it looks like we cache the sessions as well - is that in redis?
ultimately I'm looking at how to flush all sessions. if no cached stuff I'm assuming we can blow away all the data `users_sessions` unless there is a better way I'm not aware of
